main event: Two white objects of light were observed traveling north, stopping, then proceeding east before fading away after approximately 1 hour.
interesting points: The objects were visually confirmed by ground observers and radar systems., The sighting occurred near Regina, Canada., One of the sightings was correlated with the release of a weather balloon., The objects' speed matched the winds reported for that area., A military aircraft was scrambled to respond but did not intercept the objects.
sighted object: two white lights in the sky
witness description: ground visual observers and radar operators
